WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 021200Z TO 121500Z MAY
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   23-02.5S 041-03.5W, 22-42.0S 040-56.5W,
   22-07.5S 040-22.5W, 21-54.5S 039-13.5W,
   22-35.5S 039-34.5W, 22-57.0S 040-14.0W.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 121600Z MAY 17.
